title: RASG
description: RASG is a web portal that eases the process for users to develop robotics by providing regulatory guidance with an ecosystem of pragmatic and user-friendly tools.

title: Recipe Randomiser
description: Recipe Randomiser helps you choose a recipe to cook based off of the ingredients in your pantry

title: Company Maturity Survey
description: A survey tool that assesses a companies agile maturity to enable coaching and growth
